blogPost.excerpt: You have to be physically active if you want to live well and longer. Simon Says inspires you to do simple exercises during the day. Join us in the fight against sitting disease.
blogPost.body: You have to be physically active if you want to live well and longer. Simon Says inspires you to do simple exercises during the day. Join us in the fight against sitting disease.
blogPost.title: Simon Says - Activity Reminder for desk job
blogPost.author: Michael Samoylov

localize.description: 如果你想活得更好，活得更长，你就必须进行体育锻炼。西蒙说，这会激励你在白天做简单的锻炼。加入我们与坐姿疾病的斗争吧。
如果你想活得更好，活得更長，你就必須進行體育鍛煉。西蒙說，這會激勵你在白天做簡單的鍛鍊。加入我們與坐姿疾病的鬥爭吧。
